title: 30th Anniversary GM Smoidi Light General Midi Competition
description:
The Peopleâ€™s Coalition of TANDY â€œGM General Midi, 30th Anniversary Warrior of the 30 SMoidi Light 30 ZRainbow Spectrume 2022" 300 Competition!

The annual celebration of General MIDI has borne fruit!

10 tracks,
10 remixes,
and 10 General Midi compatible files!

History time:
The competition takes place in the Spring every year because March 7th is the MID-POINT between Ikutaru Kakehashi 's (from Roland) and Dave Smith's (from Sequential Circuits) birthdays
This competition is meant to honor and spread appreciation
for their dedicated work, along with all of those at the Japan MIDI Standards Committee(JMSC) and the American MIDI Manufacturers Association(MMA) !

credits.contribution:

title: 'Tetso Cube Light Ride' by elie mcafee-hahn
description: We call ourselves tandy so people know who we are

title: 'Star Palm Tree' by Sam Walters
description:
"Let's get lost inside"

In August's twilight, secret bard Sam Walters emerges to lament our ancient founders, having written of what's now, what's then, and what's to come shakily but Shurely into a naked diaryâ€”bound by 7 years of dreams, boundless love and fear.

The disappearing ink sinks from page to page, wetting with wist and longing the parchment.

The soaked book dries from its extravagant, twisted shapes into warm, familiar clothâ€”every stage inscribed into the seams as harmonics in the soul of a bell. Neither method nor madness could stir the flutter of the heart like hummingbird wings in each character's tentative steps towards the beautiful, dreadful evening.

title: 'Another Day' by Sam Walters
description:
Secret bard Sam Walters has returned with his latest incantation from the upcoming album, Centre St.

In the face great peril, you must now choose your own destiny. Will you rise to the occasion? Will the sands of regret be deposited back into your broken hourglass, renewed as crystals of possibility? Or will the cold crescendo of time wash us back to familiar shores?

Only you can decideâ€¦

title: 'Centre St.' by Sam Walters
description: Sam Walters is a songwriter, recordist, nurse-in-training, and long time Coalition member based in Brooklyn, NY. Centre St was recorded with love and meticulous care over the course of 6 years and we are so happy that this deeply personal document of life is out in the world.

title: 'Tuesday's Universe' by Tuesday Hamilton
description: A virtual art gallery by Tuesday Hamilton, presented On-Line by a subset of the PCoTandy Web Division

title: 'Slow Gold' by Nick Bisceglia
description:
âœ¼ âœ¼ âœ¼ âœ¼ âœ¼ âœ¼ âœ¼ âœ¼ âœ¼ âœ¼ âœ¼ âœ¼ âœ¼ âœ¼ âœ¼ âœ¼

"I'm loath to quit the task of helping Nick realize these settings, so a few words before our ship sails to soften the blow of its leaving: for months, a few miles upriver from Emily's town, I saw the poetry working on him. Oftentimes I would find him in his study without so much as a candle lit, a full moon casting its negative shadow over jumbles of papers and experiments, singing softly by the window. Had I not been there to guide him through the ruggedest part of the journey (bouts of melancholy, brain fever, fits, etc.), the project surely would have failed. We were fortunate enough to leave that outermost place with what seventeen minutes of material we found. What else can be said of Emily's poetry that hasn't yet? The quaintness belies its extremity - to be touched by it is to apprehend Eternity."

-Bugnu, October 2022

title: 'Into the Blue' by BLUE DISH
description: Soaring melodies and soothing tones, BLUE DISHâ€™s sophomore album welcomes you Into the Blue. Drawing upon a vast array of influences â€” from Jazz to Blues (and even Classical) â€” BLUE DISH defies genre at every moment. Rather than rushing the album to meet a deadline, the duo took their time, finding the right melodies, the right chords, and the right Sound.
label: Apple Music

title: 'Tubis' by Katarina Mazur
description:
Tubis is an audio-visual meditation on Ohioâ€™s clay-rich soil. A musical piece written for 5 tubas and electronics, the music was originally composed as part of an installation in composer Katarina Mazurâ€™s backyard, and was presented via a wireless speaker hidden in a large rusty tube.

â€œForgotten histories enshrined in a living sculptural environment of foraged objects and plant materials [...] When the corona virus struck, the installation was moved to my backyard, where I continued to meditate on its energies. The installation inspired awareness of the changing of seasons and topography of my little piece of land behind the Mickey Mart gas station and convenience store. The walnut saplings and cleavers hugged the objects. The grass grew greener. The crocuses sang their nightly song with the peepers. Tubis became a home to the sweet spirits of Spring and Summer.â€ â€“ Katarina Mazur, Composer/Director
label: Bandcamp

title: 'In Here' by Leah Jacobson
description:
â€œSkilled hands make quick workâ€

[ 8-page comics zine ]

Dream-like miniature narratives celebrating the ineffable textures of the subconscious, the quiet power of friendship and the intangible gestures of the spirit! Leah Jacobsonâ€™s characters will muck-about and roll-around in vibrant two-color riso toner. Leah Jacobson makes comics, sews, referees soccer, and pursues her doctorate in sociology in Los Angeles, CA. PCOT0012

title: 'Deep Blue' by BLUE DISH
description:
Hand-designed, hand-assembled, hand-made, self-produced, the "Deep Blue Triple Album" includes a 16-page art booklet, the brand new 8-song album "Deep Blue", BLUE DISH's previous 2 releases "Out of the Blue" & "Into the Blue".

Hand-packaged in Recycled Jewel Cases and printed in a local print shop, this album is sure to soothe & satisfy. 

"Now that you've gotten acquainted, please make yourself comfortable in the Deep Blue. This is the world birthed from our ongoing lives & relationships as musicians & â€“ more importantly â€“ as friends."
â€“ BLUE DISH, Deep Blue release memo '23

title: Song of Blue, Knight of Dish
description:
Summer is coming to an end, but the relief is everlasting. BLUE DISH usher in a new season of soothing music with the release of their new music video on YouTube today.

BLUE DISH is excited to release their new single Song of Blue, Knight of DISH. It's an acoustic guitar piece, performed by the duo known as BLUE DISH.

In this video, you will see them playing their guitars. The film is set in a small castle. The castle is not real but is made out of paper to create a playful medieval atmosphere.The musicians were shot alone and later added to the scene using green screen technology.

Although the setting is medieval, the songs are contemporary. This creates an interesting mix of old and new.
The video shows various parts of the castle as the musicians perform, and you 'll notice that the castle hasn't changed - it 's still very simple, like Focus on the music. Throughout the entire film, there are no other characters, just the musicians and the castle.It's a simple performance that highlights BLUE DISH's soundtrack and the unique setting they chose.The simplicity of the film lets you focus on the music as well as the creative visual style.

BLUE DISH hope you enjoy this video and their new song Song of blue, knight of dish.The video is now available for you to watch on YouTube.

title: Pink Room Pastoral by Joohee Park
description:
The pink room
A faceless woman lying on the ground.
A rotating fan inflates and deflates her dress, simulating breath.
The cat stalks across the carpet.
Planes of feeling stutter and transmute,
silvery pools that bleed across the screen.
Violence seeps in through the window,
bubbling beneath the sleepy pastoral daydream
As quickly as the feeling comes it goes,
slipping softly from the room.
